Uses of Interface
sage.renderer.IRenderer

  • Packages that use IRenderer 
    Package Description
    sage.app  
    sage.camera  
    sage.display  
    sage.renderer  
    sage.renderer.jogl  
    sage.scene  
    sage.scene.shape  

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.app

      Methods in sage.app that return IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRenderer BaseGame.getRenderer()
      Returns the IRenderer used by the IDisplaySystem used by BaseGame.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.camera

      Fields in sage.camera declared as IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IRenderer AbstractCamera.myRenderer
      The IRenderer used by this camera.
      Constructors in sage.camera with parameters of type IRenderer 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractCamera(IRenderer renderer)
      Constructs an AbstractCamera associated with the specified IRenderer and having a set of default attributes.
      JOGLCamera(IRenderer renderer)
      Constructs a JOGLCamera associated with the specified IRenderer.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.display

      Methods in sage.display that return IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRenderer IDisplaySystem.getRenderer()
      Returns the IRenderer currently associated with this IDisplay.
      IRenderer DisplaySystem.getRenderer()
      Returns the IRenderer object being used to draw on (render) this DisplaySystem.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.renderer

      Classes in sage.renderer that implement IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRenderer
      This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Renderers are derived.
      Methods in sage.renderer that return IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IRenderer RendererFactory.createRenderer(java.lang.String rendererClassName)
      A factory method (see the Factory Design Pattern) for creating instances of a particular AbstractRenderer (that is, an object which implements the IRenderer interface.
      Methods in sage.renderer with parameters of type IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RenderContext.initRenderStateRecords(IRenderer r)
      Initializes the render state records of this RenderContext.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.renderer.jogl

      Classes in sage.renderer.jogl that implement IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JOGLActiveRenderer 
      class  JOGLRenderer
      This class implements the IRenderer interface using the JOGL Java interface to OpenGL (http://jogamp.org), providing a JOGL-based renderer.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.scene

      Methods in sage.scene with parameters of type IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TriMesh.draw(IRenderer r)
      draw() invokes predraw() for this Leaf, invokes the specified IRenderer to draw the Leaf, then invokes postdraw() for this Leaf.
      abstract void SceneNode.draw(IRenderer r)
      Draws this SceneNode using the specified IRenderer.
      void Model3DTriMesh.draw(IRenderer r)
      draw() invokes predraw() for this Leaf, invokes the specified IRenderer to draw the Leaf, then invokes postdraw() for this Leaf.
      abstract void Leaf.draw(IRenderer r)
      draw() draws the graphical representation of this Leaf.
      void HUDString.draw(IRenderer renderer)
      Draws this HUDString on the HUD using the specified IRenderer.
      void HUDImage.draw(IRenderer r)
      Draws this HUDImage on the HUD using the specified IRenderer.
      void Group.draw(IRenderer r)
      calling draw() on a Group is an error; only Leafs have drawable content.
      void TriMesh.postdraw(IRenderer r)
      This method is called by TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) after the call to the renderer's draw() method in TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) returns; it restores the RenderMethod of the renderer to its former (saved) state.
      void Model3DTriMesh.postdraw(IRenderer r) 
      void Leaf.postdraw(IRenderer r)
      postdraw() is intended to be called just after the renderer finishes drawing this Leaf.
      boolean TriMesh.predraw(IRenderer r)
      This method is called by TriMesh.draw(IRenderer) prior to invoking the renderer to draw this TriMesh; it forces the IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD of the renderer to become IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD.VERTEX_ARRAY.
      boolean Model3DTriMesh.predraw(IRenderer r) 
      boolean Leaf.predraw(IRenderer r)
      predraw() contains any code which should be executed immediately prior to rendering this Leaf object; it is intended to be called just before invoking a renderer to start drawing this Leaf.

    • Uses of IRenderer in sage.scene.shape

      Methods in sage.scene.shape with parameters of type IRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Teapot.draw(IRenderer renderer)
      Draws this Teapot object.
      void Square.draw(IRenderer renderer)
      Draws this Square
      void Sphere.draw(IRenderer r) 
      void Rectangle.draw(IRenderer renderer) 
      void Polyhedron3D.draw(IRenderer renderer) 
      void Polygon3D.draw(IRenderer renderer)
      Draws this Polygon3D.
      void Line.draw(IRenderer r)
      Uses the specified IRenderer to draw the Line.
      void Cylinder.draw(IRenderer renderer) 
      void Cube.draw(IRenderer r)
      Uses the specified IRenderer to draw this Cube.
